articles.summary: Overnight Ukrainian Drone Attacks on Russia Spark Fires, Disrupt Highway Traffic Damage from a Ukrainian drone attack in the Kursk region. articles.title: Poland election: Conservative historian Nawrocki wins presidential vote - BBC
articles.summary: Conservative historian wins Polish presidential vote Karol Nawrocki is Poland's next president With all votes counted, right-wing historian Karol Nawrocki has been elected Poland's new president, the state electoral commission (PKW) said. PKW said Nawrocki won 50. 9% percent of the votes – ahead of Warsaw's liberal mayor Rafal Trzaskowski on 49. 1% percent. It's a sensational turnaround from the...
